body_html: Nice catch @neerajprad ! I think we should also add this to Categoricals as well. While browsing I also realized we have a real_vector constraint, used in MultivariateNormal. We can get rid of that since we already do .all() while validating args (just to be clear, i'm asking your opinion, not bikeshedding 😄 )
body_text: Nice catch @neerajprad ! I think we should also add this to Categoricals as well. While browsing I also realized we have a real_vector constraint, used in MultivariateNormal. We can get rid of that since we already do .all() while validating args (just to be clear, i'm asking your opinion, not bikeshedding 😄 )
body: Nice catch @neerajprad ! I think we should also add this to `Categorical`s as well. While browsing I also realized we have a `real_vector` constraint, used in `MultivariateNormal`. We can get rid of that since we already do `.all()` while validating args (just to be clear, i'm asking your opinion, not bikeshedding 😄 )
